name: Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of Famine
text: This monster can only be Summoned if you control a monster with "Four Knight's of the Apocalypse, Horsemen of War" in its name. Whenever a monster is Normal Summoned: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. When a monster is Special Summoned: Your opponent sends a card from the top of their Deck to the GY. When your opponent activates a Spell or Trap: Your opponent sends the top 5 cards of their Deck to the GY.
